oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Veterans in front of a cannon

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Streets; Plazas; Veterans; Organizations; Celebrations; Cannons
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Street scene on the main square in Ripley, Tennessee, during a celebration involving Confederate veterans and members of the Daughters of the Confederacy. Ten individuals pose in front of a large siege cannon.
